thread.title: Hugh Ralph Smith
thread.title_full: www.namensschilder-nbi.de bewertet von Hugh Ralph Smith

author: Hugh Ralph Smith
title: Hugh Ralph Smith
text:
I was very touched and impressed by your sales representative, Mr. Green. With his help I was able to get past the difficulties in making my order.
I have not yet used the name badges, that we have ordered so I can make no comment about the quality. The speed and efficiency with which my order was delivered was remarkable
